analysis.statement: Have a documented change management procedure

checks.description: Verify Azure DevOps work item tracking for changes
checks.request: az boards work-item list --organization https://dev.azure.com/fedramp --project fedramp-project --query '[?fields."System.WorkItemType"==`Change Request`].{Id:id, Title:fields."System.Title", State:fields."System.State", AssignedTo:fields."System.AssignedTo".displayName}' --output json

az pipelines release list --organization https://dev.azure.com/fedramp --project fedramp-project --query '[0:2].{Id:id, Status:status, Environments:environments[].{Name:name, Status:status}}' --output json

checks.description: Verify emergency change procedures are documented
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify emergency change procedures, escalation paths, and post-implementation reviews

checks.description: Verify change management policy documentation and training
checks.response: Documentation review required to verify change management policy documentation, staff training records, and procedure compliance monitoring
